title: [NA] Silver Tournament Team :: Team Elo Complexity Seeking Active Players=>>
body:
Team Name : **Team Elo Complexity **
Tournament Website : **[Compete League :: Bronze & Silver League](https://lol.competeleague.com/#/leagues-silver-premier)**
Tournament Stream : **[Compete League Twitch Stream](https://www.twitch.tv/competeleague)**
TLDR; Below is a lot of information about our team and the league we are in. Our application for our team is at the bottom of this page.


**Serious Inquiries:**  Be on at 2:30 PM PST for Tryouts. 
_**Side NOTE**_: If you were **GOLD** or **HIGHER** last season **DO NOT APPLY
**

FILL OUT THE FORUM TO BE ADDED

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Currently **Recruiting**

Top: Fiasivimadoh (Looking for Subs)
JGL: SeaDogs (Looking for Subs)
MID (Open)
AD Carry (Open)
Support (Open)
Substitution's for all Roles
Coaches, Analysts, and Volunteers
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
About the League : Compete League is a tournament league open to all divisions of play. We play in the Bronze & Silver League. There is a Premier League and Open League. To play in the Open League, our team needs a complete team of Five players. You can think of the open league as a 'Practice' and 'Scrim' league that you play in before the premier league. The next season for the premier league begins in June. We plan to play in this league. As a team, we will need to play against other teams in the Open League and qualify for a spot in the premier league.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Days : Each Monday of the month, between the times of **4:30 PM** to **8:00 PM** Pacific Standard Time (Possibility of later nights based on game length) Game day schedule subject to change based on tournament admins discretion.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Able to play at a high caliber competitively.
Willing to accept a try-outs weather they be 1 game or 10.
Able to adapt and adjust play styles to fit the team, composition, and enemy team.
Excel in communication with a team of Four others to achieve positive outcomes on Discord.
Able to provide positive reinforcement and critique for yourself as well as team members in constructive manners.
An open schedule with room to work in practice with the team and game days.
Between the divisions of Bronze 5 and Silver 1.
If you are interested, we ask that you fill out our short Q&A in a post below.

Thank you, 
Fiasivimadoh

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In-game Name :
Age :
Timezone :
Role :
Solo Queue Division :
Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N) :
List; Your Top 3 Champions for Role Applying :
Briefly describe your play style :
Your strongest attributes :
Your weakest attributes :
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team :
Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) :
The best time to reach you in-game :

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=oOo zzz oOo,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=EQhLwEpO,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-06-11T23:20:42.672+0000)
>
> oOo zzz oOo

Role: Any, Age: old enough

In-game Name : PumpedPhobic
Age : 14
Timezone : PDT
Role : Mid
Solo Queue Division : Silver 3
Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N) : Yes
List; Your Top 3 Champions for Role Applying : Zed, Viktor, Leblanc
Briefly describe your play style : I look to destroy my lane opponent, whether it's by zoning them from not getting cs, or by killing him many times to make him useless by the end of the game. When I push in I also like to spread my lead to other lanes by ganking.
Your strongest attributes : 1v1's, skirmishes, macro play, shot calling
Your weakest attributes : micro play, getting vision
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team : I would like to be apart of the team because it allows a big step for me in the league scene. 
Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) : I have been on a call of duty tournament team for black ops 2 on PC. I was the shot caller for that team. We eventually won a small tournament of 50$.
The best time to reach you in-game : Right now I am in summer break, so anytime between 12pm and 1am is fine.

IGN:KoreanVayneADC
Role: Mid
Rank:Bronze
Top 3 champs for the Role:Yasuo, LB, Azir
Strengths: Great at csing, and teamfights
Weaknesses: over agro
Availability: all day
Prior Ranked experience: played in few 5s before
Thoughts on Criticism: i will take it as new learning experience
Why we should choose you: i think i will surprise u

In-game Name : kidnegative
Age :18
Timezone :Eastern
Role :ADC
Solo Queue Division :silver 2
Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N) :Yes
List; Your Top 3 Champions for Role Applying : Twitch , Lucian , Caitlyn
Briefly describe your play style : Teamfighting . Aggressive when can be. Play to win the game and with the team
Your strongest attributes : Teamfighting , rotating around the map for objectives
Your weakest attributes : Playing from behind , but have learned to play better when behind
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team : I want to play competitively and grow with a team. I love to play on the competitive side of league.
Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) : played on a few ranked teams. Scrims , tournaments etc
The best time to reach you in-game : Every Day On All the time , Also have the LoL App so message me on there too.

Heres my lolking, hope to hear from you soon. http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/45098398#ranked-stats

In-game Name : Madlyfee

Solo Queue Division : Silv 3

Briefly describe your play style : Aggressive and confident
Your strongest attributes : Very confident in the playing of my ads that I practice with, as well as team experience
Your weakest attributes : Sometimes a bit too overconfident, occasional tunnel
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team : I've been part of one before and I prefer the 5s aspect of league very much to the solo queue aspect. Also just want to get better at the game
Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) : I was part of EZG when they were together, we went to semi's of almost every in house, which was the point where the diamond teams came in.
The best time to reach you in-game : Mostly any time to be honest. If I'm not on, I'm on the app on my phone and can probably get on
